amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Payment in Lieu of Taxes program by $20 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease funds for the Office of the Secretary (Indian Affairs) by $20,148,000. And, increase funds for the Department-Wide Programs by $20,148,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cannon amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Cannon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cannon amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
